title: Lamar Odom | Ep 80 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Lamar Odom | Ep 80 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
2x NBA Champion and Lakers legend, Lamar Odom, joins the boys on a must-see episode of ALL THE SMOKE. Odom reflects on his Laker's career, winning titles in 2009 & 10, and playing with Kobe. Plus, he opens up about his issues with substance abuse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
